body: Fuck man I read forgetting about how Webtoons works
Anyone have any suggestions for a manga i can read like this one?
This dude. I'm a sensible guy and I can understand not to fuck someone when another girl is trying to actually get with you.

Dude it spoils the fun stopping on chap 22 , as they already started it but ended it there.. 
Secondly , that part is the most anticipated part as they are finally doing it ... 
But so far so good ,I hope it doesn't contain heart breaking scenes in the future ... There would 100 % have a rocky relationship after this..

@flagrais I was honestly just salty at the hypocrisy from the MC and from the childhood friend when I wrote that. Manager was kinda wrong for doing that but unless Japan has different laws, he cannot go to jail and it isn't exactly sexual harassment since the photo shoot was already sexual as hell. Like the manager said, it was just pics on another device. Literally he could've just taken normal pics like the magazine photographer but because they were zoomed in it's apparently harassment. Bullshit on that. Either way, that nigga and the hoe were acting like hypocrites that's what bothered me.

@SaikiK6,
Holy shit dude, do you even hear yourself? "Manager had every right to take pics" my ass, what he's doing is blatant sexual harassment of a female co-worker. The irate wife is the least problem the manager has to worry about since you can get jailed for that.
Third update i read every time its a good session

Bruh this nigga went to fuck another hoe and then he gets all mad at the photo shoot tf. He should just stay with that other hoe, also, the manager had every right to take pics bruh, but that bitch had to save the guy she likes
i hope for more chapters, great plot.
Great webtoon lol this is probably the best I’ve ever read
9.5/10 one of the best ones on this site
STOP with the copy and paste please

If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me (i accidentally read this comment, so sorry
Finally something with an intresting plot
this is pretty good, 9/10 - nice artstyle and the scenes are very nice
